name: Hungry hamster mega maze
description: WASD or arrow keys to move, On level select press W or the up arrow in front of a tunnel to enter the world and have fun! In this game you are a hamster looking for his meal across different mazes while finding healthy snacks along the way! (Code by Quinton Bailey and the music, art and level design is by Jamie Wind Whitemarsh https://a103music.itch.io/.)
